packages.name: WesMC-UtilsLibrary
packages.description: General-purpose functions leveraged in downstream WesMC applications
packages.descriptive:
• INSTALLS: lUtils (library), Demo-Utils (app)
  • UTILS: safeParseInt(), cleanStrings(), modeNames(), switchState()
  • LOGGING: setLogLevel(), logTrace(), logDebug(), logInfo(), logWarn(), logError()
  • HTML: h1(), h2(), h3(), bullet1(), bullet2(), b(), i(), bi()
  • DEBUGGING: eventDetails()
